*A warm-up quiz about CSS*

Complete this quiz in class

1. HTML elements must have either a class or an id in order to be styled

- [ ] true
- [ ] false

2. CSS stands for 'Complete Style Sheets'

- [ ] true
- [ ] false

3. CSS can be used to create animations 

- [ ] true
- [ ] false
